title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not work consistently. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Close all editors.
2. Create a new file 'f1.txt'.
3. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.

Expected Behavior: All open editors should be closed and the file 'f1.txt' should be saved if there are any unsaved changes.
